amendatorysection.catchline: Judicial nominating commission; selection; provisions applicable.
amendatorysection.para: Judicial nominating commissions for the office of judge of the separate juvenile court shall be selected in the manner and subject to all of the terms and provisions of law relating to judicial nominating commissions generally, as provided by the Constitution of Nebraska and the laws of this state.

crossreference.para: For provisions of nominating commission, see sections 24-801 to 24-812.01.
